title: Repository missing centralized configuration documentation

evidence.snippet: N/A - smoke benchmark, no file reads performed

recommendation: Add a CONTRIBUTING.md or architecture doc describing project structure and configuration conventions

title: Manual skill registry in AGENTS.md is hard to keep in sync

evidence.snippet: ### Available skills ... (manually enumerated list of skill names, descriptions, and file paths).

recommendation: Generate this section from a single machine-readable skills manifest (or enforce consistency with a CI check) so additions/removals don’t require duplicated manual edits.

title: Shell scripts lack strict error handling flags
recommendation: Add 'set -euo pipefail' to the beginning of shell scripts to ensure they fail fast on errors, unset variables, or pipeline failures, which improves reliability and debugging.

title: Project root lacks explicit maintainability metadata file

evidence.snippet: No dedicated maintainability conventions file (e.g., CONTRIBUTING.md or CODEOWNERS) is present at the scoped root.

recommendation: Add a root-level maintainability metadata file (such as CONTRIBUTING.md) defining coding conventions, review ownership, and change workflow to reduce long-term maintenance friction.

title: Missing TypeScript configuration

evidence.snippet: Project structure lacks tsconfig.json for TypeScript type checking

recommendation: Add tsconfig.json to enable TypeScript compiler options and improve IDE support
